titles.title: To amend title 4, United States Code, to provide for the proper display of the flag over a one-way street.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/14/2005--Introduced. Provides that a U.S. flag that is displayed over the middle of a one-way street should be suspended vertically with the union to the left of an observer moving in the direction of traffic.
